titleStmt.title: Æsop improved, or, Above three hundred and fifty fables, mostly Æsop's with their morals paraphrased in English verse : amounting to about one hundred and fifty more than do appear to have been so rendered by any other hand.
titleStmt.author: Aesop.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: Tho. Singleton and Tho. Houghton.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
